sys_openapi_operation.name: Upgrade Linode
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Upgrade Linode","fOperationId":"mutateLinodeInstance","fDescription":"Linodes created with now-deprecated Types are entitled to a free upgrade to the next generation. A mutating Linode will be allocated any new resources the upgraded Type provides, and will be subsequently restarted if it was currently running.
If any actions are currently running or queued, those actions must be completed first before you can initiate a mutate.
","fPath":"/linode/instances/{linodeId}/mutate","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fDescription":"Whether to automatically resize disks or not.","fRequired":false,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson9592297758","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[{"fName":"allow_auto_disk_resize","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"boolean","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"Automatically resize disks when resizing a Linode. When resizing down to a smaller plan your Linode's data must fit within the smaller disk size.
","fDefault":true,"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"boolean"}],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Mutate
